import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import Header from '../../components/header'; import Footer from '../../components/footer'; import { setProfile } from '../../features/userSlice'; import './user.css' const Profile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const user = useSelector(state => state.user); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { if(!user.token || user.firstName) return; fetch ('http://localhost:3001/api/v1/user/profile', { method : 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/Json', 'Authorization' : `Bearer ${user.token}` }, }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { dispatch(setProfile({ email : data.body.email, firstname: data.body.firstName, lastname: data.body.lastName })) setIsLoading(false) }) .catch(err => { // redirection vers la page connexion }) }, [user.token]) if(isLoading) return
